title: unfairly banned for 15 days
body:
im just gonna write what im thinking 

ok so i believe i got banned unfairly its as if the person that banned me didnt even look at the replays

heres the chatlogs

Game 1
21174: dont get exhaist of ir a damage dealing sup
21174: im telling u to play better
21174: noob
21174: stop being emotional
21174: ur bad
21174: lol
21174: makes no sense u get exhaust
21174: when ur a skillshot
21174: champ
21174: that does dmg
21174: instead of sustaining ad
21174: hes a kid
21174: makes no sense you get exhaust when ur a damage dealing support
21174: ?
21174: ur reported
21174: Just so you know
21174: if one critcism gets you mad
21174: you deserve to get banned
21174: ur literally trolling
21174: toxic?
21174: LOL
21174: i haven said anyrhng toxic to you untl you raged
21174: when i explained to you rationally why
21174: you should take
21174: Ignite
21174: instead of exhaust
21174: bronze?
21174: ur pulling that out of ur ass
21174: i never said bronze
21174: lol
21174: ur projecting
21174: Lol
21174: are you gonna go meele
21174: just to exhust someone
21174: you call me an idiot for explaining to you why ignite is way better
21174: if your a damage dealing champ
21174: u dont shield do you?
21174: lol
21174: ur silver for ar eason
21174: gold is the same as silver
21174: report vel toxic
21174: taking cs and toxic
21174: calls me toxic when i havent said anything remotely negative
21174: lol
21174: bodyblocking darius?
21174: what does that even mean
21174: LOL
21174: taking cs
21174: huh
21174: ur so reported
21174: you leave my lane and come back
21174: jsut to take it
21174: nah
21174: ur reported
21174: its mine
21174: you have mental problems vel
21174: im not saying that as an insult
21174: you have problems
21174: i havent pinged once
21174: you are trolling
21174: i havent pinged once
21174: please report vel
21174: if you want proof that hes trolling
21174: watch replay
Game 2
21174: u steal my ad and sup
21174: both my roles
21174: i didnt even call
21174: i could outtype u]
21174: if i wanted to
21174: lol
21174: my wpm is 160
21174: avg
21174: so did blitz
21174: ?
21174: I joined the room before u did lmao
21174: u never said anything
21174: reported vayne
21174: And blitz
21174: reported blitz and avyne
21174: trolling
21174: if u were actually trying to play the game u would let vayne solo
21174: but u leave me alone on bot
21174: blitz didnt call anything
21174: plus ur troling
21174: ur letting me die
21174: ???
21174: ur useless blitz
21174: lol
21174: 1/3 as blitz
21174: u should be hooking
21174: alot
21174: ur barely hooking at all
21174: ur bad too evelyn
21174: ur positioning makes me cringe
21174: veigar is the only one decent here
21174: lo
21174: l
21174: 10 kills from noob enemy
21174: vayne is always alone
21174: 4and jarvan is so bad
21174: lol
21174: u are
21174: hah
21174: hahahaha
21174: im more useful than you
21174: lol
21174: u sure look banable
Game 3
21174: what
21174: bullshit
21174: range
21174: wtf
21174: where yhe fk are u guys
21174: lmao
21174: afk team
21174: bruh
21174: we coulve won that
21174: ????
21174: why would i help u lmao
21174: u have an escape
21174: u wasted it
21174: ur reported
21174: report toxic corki pls
21174: corki trolling asw ell
21174: SPLIT

im pretty sure the first game got me banned but let me explain why i think i dont deserve a 15 day time off

first game you can clearly tell iwas to some degree being toxic so i guess i should get some form of penalty yea i completly understand that maybe a chat restriction? i already got 2 chat restrictions which i think is ridiculous ive seen some guy say a racial slur  which i did report and never got a response saying we have given this guy some sort of penalty if he can get away with that why cant i get away with being toxic (for a reason) 
2nd one? i was being toxic but i wasnt trolling if you just watch the replay you could tell that i was mad because they were trolling by not helping and leaving me on bot to 2v1  [replay matters alot]

3rd game i believe two[?]/one players honored me because i was actually trying compared to corki who wasblatantly trolling

and its not like i was being toxic to my team every game

whoever reviewed my chat log just straight up banned me without invensigating further and assumed im just one of the many toxic players you see every day 

and also blitz did not call any role at all i joined the room before he did



yes its poorly written im too sad i got a ban on this acc that ws supposed to be my reformed account

replies.body:
Hold up let me get this straight. You flamed a {{champion:161}} support for taking {{summoner:3}} ? First of all, Vel support should be taking {{summoner:3}}. If not to help mitigate damage off his adc, than to mitigate damage off himself. Vel is one of the squishiest mages in the game. Chances are if someone gets on him, he is going to die without {{summoner:3}}.  You don't need to get into melee range to proc it, not sure where you got that from. It also guarantees a landed knock up.

The rest of the chat was toxic and you earned the ban.

> [{quoted}](name=Zeppelins circus,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=r4Wxlzj4,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-11-05T07:50:56.845+0000)
>
> I was the velkoz support.


I feel so bad for you.
why was his comment deleted
I feel bad for you better luck next time!

Remember, man, reports do count.
If you ever need a reminder if your opinion on toxicity is ever heard, just come to the board. 
You'll see countless players being banned every day for their attitude. Keep your head up.

someone please check this guys chat log  and the replay i dont care if my ban is not lifted as long as this guy gets the punishment he deserves he is blatantly lying right now just by cutting the whole conversation into parts that favor him
this community sucks i got a downvote for just asking someone to check his chat log ridiculous

Sadly only a riot employee can check his logs
Don't engage with people who you feel are trolling you, it just leads you to appearing bad
Simply ignore/mute depending on the instance. Does way more for your case than responding/attacking them
you are the only one here who made an actual reply with no micro trolling thank you for being you

Your punishment was based on YOUR chat logs alone. Others has nothing to do with it. What I can say is that, your chat logs  from both in-game & the personal attack on the Velkoz player, I wished you've taken an instant permaban instead.

i dont want my ban to get lifted i want him to get banned as well not for the sake of revenge  but because he was way more toxic than me and im the only one who got banned LOL hes lying right now and you cant even tell or maybe you can but you just like to circle jerk on the perceived "toxic" player lol mob mentality is dangerous

I also would like to point out that you were toxic in all 3 games, and they can only view 3 games of chat logs in your account/email, which can also mean that you may have been just as toxic in almost all your previous games to be landing an instant 15 days suspension. Did you receive any chat restrictions in the past?

So technically, wanting that Velkoz guy to be banned is nothing more than a minuscule factor. If he got reported but not punished yet, it shows he doesn't show out a lot of toxicity as much as you do.

You said this:

> whoever reviewed my chat log just straight up banned me without invensigating further and assumed im just one of the many toxic players you see every day

You're implying at first that your ban wasn't deserved at all as you still want to see the other's chat logs to determine whether you're banworthy or not. And right now, you're giving mix signals.

If you want to get someone reported for their toxicity, you could've at least screenshot the chat logs in-game? Instead of being an attention seeker here, submit a ticket to Riot Support to talk to them personally.

thought this was the place to appeal my ban well whatever im not gonna try any longer just gonna wait out the 15 day

ive invested too much time trying to convince you people to atleast check the replay instead of instantly labeling me as another case of "salty toxic baned player" not gonna try anymore only in movies does one man win against an army 
herd mentality is the strongest
i need the chat log
what you say doesnt  match up to what i remember why cant you provide the chat logs?

Why even fight and flame for what someone else does? Not every player has to be some carbon copy of you or some outright meta slave. Take into account what **you** said in your Game 1. You could have just rolled with the punches and played your game but you decided to take i upon yourself and try to play Zepp's game as well as if hey you're both buddies. Sure Support Velkoz is a rare pick to see. Sure an odd summoner spell choice is an odd option to come across (I play bot lane often with Exhaust myself - Reason: usually assassins). The flaming just didn't have to happen and I really think you know that.

someone please check this guys chat log  and the replay i dont care if my ban is not lifted as long as this guy gets the punishment he deserves he is blatantly lying right now just by cutting the whole conversation into parts that favor him also you keep downvoting my comments which is very immature of you
show the whole conversation why did you cut it
why did you cut it?

The punishment system works in tiers. The tiers are:
10 game chat restriction
25 game chat restriction
14 day suspension
Permanent suspension

Be aware that the next time you are reported correctly you will be permanently suspended.

Also, you don't always get feedback when someone you reported was punished.
You need to stop talking. You spent so much time talking you were an active detriment to your team. When something is actively detrimental to something, its toxic. Type less.

i responded an equal amount to the person i talk to. im assuming you think its just one sided spamming which it isnt.talking to if you check my chatlog i never am toxic to my team [chatlog contradicts what im saying but let me explain] its just one of those things someone says when their mad plus i wasnt talking at all on game 3 i just said wtf afk team which i dont think anyone found toxic at all since if i remeber correctly i got 2 or 1 honor from that game maybe wrong game idk i dont keep track

> [{quoted}](name=21174,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=r4Wxlzj4,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-05T07:44:16.888+0000)
>
> i responded an equal amount to the person i talk to. im assuming you think its just one sided spamming which it isnt.talking to if you check my chatlog i never am toxic to my team [chatlog contradicts what im saying but let me explain] its just one of those things someone says when their mad plus i wasnt talking at all on game 3 i just said wtf afk team which i dont think anyone found toxic at all since if i remeber correctly i got 2 or 1 honor from that game maybe wrong game idk i dont keep track

feel sorry for you. having to play with bad players who troll then report you

> [{quoted}](name=21174,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=r4Wxlzj4,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-05T07:44:16.888+0000)
>
> i responded an equal amount to the person i talk to. im assuming you think its just one sided spamming which it isnt.talking to if you check my chatlog i never am toxic to my team [chatlog contradicts what im saying but let me explain] its just one of those things someone says when their mad plus i wasnt talking at all on game 3 i just said wtf afk team which i dont think anyone found toxic at all since if i remeber correctly i got 2 or 1 honor from that game maybe wrong game idk i dont keep track

You need to mute them and not retaliate if you're unable to contain yourself

You spent so much time being toxic you're blinded by it.
You can't even tell right from wrong. Hope you learn from this for the next 15 days.
you are being passive aggresive

there you go again with the passive aggresiveness 

if you just take the time to read what you wrote instead of condemning me as a typical toxic player "BLINDED" by toxicity

i clearly stated in my first post that i am aware some of the things ive said  can result in a penalty but a ban is ridiculous

you are just here to raise your post count and be passive aggresive

>if you just take the time to read what you wrote instead of condemning me as a typical toxic player "BLINDED" by toxicity

>i clearly stated in my first post that i am aware some of the things ive said can result in a penalty 

Please reflect *_very carefully_* on these two paragraphs, how they're juxtaposed, and how they relate to your current situation.

if someones toxic why cant they just remove  the chat permanently from that player instead of giving them "time to reflect on your mistakes" if someone intentionally feeds then ban its easy as that whyy cant they implement that on the game
Because chat is still an important communication tool, and most people start behaving themselves after the first restriction.
pings are enough for me that argument is weak
They probably are enough at ranks below Plat.
by penalty i meant a chat restriction at best
a penalty thats not a 15 day ban
Well deserved lmfao
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Did you already get a 25 game restriction? If so, 14 day is the next punishment and this is punishment worthy.

Sorry bro. The only way you're going to get this taken care of is to file a ticket with support under the option: "I have a question about a suspension on my account"

Take your time, be clear and concise, free of emotion, stating just fact.

It's the only way. But from the 1st 4 lines of your chat ... 

It's not lookin too good.

Take the 14-day ban. Appreciate it. Read posts about reform. Watch videos about tilt. Change your music. Do what you have to do in that 14 day period to come back right and proper.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

Don't do like Me, get it reduced... and get permabanned the next day.
